document.full_text: the economic recovery is so sluggish that the federal reserve needs to keep easy money policies in place while the government comes to grip with its debts, the international monetary fund said on monday.
document.title: imf says sluggish u.s. growth requires easy money policy
lines_and_colors: the economic recovery is so sluggish that the federal reserve needs to keep easy money policies in place while the government comes to grip with its debts, the international monetary fund said on monday.
